name: A Sniper War Zone - Elite Army Snipers In Combat Games
name_original: A Sniper War Zone - Elite Army Snipers In Combat Games
description:
Combat time! Grab your sniper rifle, and get ready for some crazy, action packed combat! In this thrilling shooting game, you are up against an army of terrorists that have ambushed your elite sniper team.

Will you make it out? It's up to you!
